sections.title: The fastest way to build data products
sections.description: deX is a unified data platform to fuel analytics,  data science, and AI with trusted data.

sections.title: Work in multiple environments
sections.description:
Work across environments with improved collaboration and streamlined development
 to ensure a smooth transition from development to production.

sections.title: Embed testing into your workflow
sections.description:
Integrate data testing into your CI/CD 
pipeline with a single line of code. Make data quality checks maintainable to ensure data quality and integrity.

sections.title: Automate  DAG creation
sections.description:
Automatically create and manage Airflow DAGs based on your data models. 
Focus on your business and reduce your workflow code by 70%

sections.title: Build. Review. Deploy.
sections.description: Use native Git integration for seamless version control and use pull requests (PRs) to merge updates efficiently.

sections.title: Ready to get started?
sections.caption: See what you can do with a unified Lakehouse Platform
